titles: Doctor Fludds answer vnto MÂ· Foster or, The squeesing of Parson Fosters sponge, ordained by him for the wiping away of the weapon-salue VVherein the sponge-bearers immodest carriage and behauiour towards his bretheren is detected ...
Doctor Fludds answer unto M. Foster.
author: Fludd, Robert, 1574-1637.
publisher: Printed [by J. Beale and G. Purslowe?] for Nathanael Butter,
notes: A reply to: Foster, William.  Hoplocrisma spongus.
